alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gosper and southwestern Dawson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eustis, or 16 miles west of Lexington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
